curPatternObj.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance A
curPatternObj.2: Step 1. Move the right foot to A to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a side front block with the right inner forearm and extending the left forearm side-downward.
curPatternObj.3: Step 2. Execute a side front block with the left inner forearm extending the right forearm side downward while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.4: Step 3. Bring the right foot to the left foot forming a closed stance toward D while executing an angle punch with the left fist. Perform in slow motion.
curPatternObj.5: Step 4. Move the left foot to D to form a left walking stance toward while executing a high thrust to D with the right double finger.
curPatternObj.6: Step 5. Move the right foot to D to form a right walking stance toward while executing a high thrust to D with the left double finger.
curPatternObj.7: Step 6. Execute a front strike to D with the right back fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
curPatternObj.8: Step 7. Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a rising block with the left forearm.
curPatternObj.9: Step 8. Move the right foot to D to form a right walking stance toward D at the same time executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
curPatternObj.10: Step 9. Move the right foot to C turning counter clockwise and then slide to C to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.11: Step 10. Execute a low front snap kick to D with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 9.
curPatternObj.12: Step 11. Lower the right foot to D forming a right low stance toward D while executing a high thrust to D with the right flat finger tip.
curPatternObj.13: Step 12. Execute a high turning kick to D with the right foot supporting the body with both hands and the left knee.
curPatternObj.14: Step 13. Lower the right foot to D and then execute a high punch to D with the right fist while pressing the ground with the left palm.
curPatternObj.15: Step 14. Move the left foot to D turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward C while thrusting to D with the left side elbow.
curPatternObj.16: Step 15. Move the left foot to C turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward D at the same time executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.17: Step 16. Move the right foot to C forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a scooping block with the left palm.
curPatternObj.18: Step 17. Move the left foot to C forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle outward strike to D with the right knife-hand.
curPatternObj.19: Step 18. Execute a pressing block with an X-fist while forming a left walking stance toward C pivoting with the right foot.
curPatternObj.20: Step 19. Execute a low front snap kick to C with the right knee while pulling both hands in the opposite direction as if grabbing the opponent's leg.
curPatternObj.21: Step 20. Lower the right foot to C forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
curPatternObj.22: Step 21. Move the right foot to D in a sliding motion to form a right L-stance toward C while thrusting to D with the right side elbow.
curPatternObj.23: Step 22. Execute a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand while forming a left L-stance toward D pivoting with the left foot.
curPatternObj.24: Step 23. Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the right foot while pulling both hands in the opposite direction.
curPatternObj.25: Step 24. Lower the right foot to D and then execute a pressing block with a twin palm while forming a right rear foot stance toward C, pivoting with the right foot.
curPatternObj.26: Step 25. Move the right foot to C to form a right walking stance toward C while executing a high front block to C with the right outer forearm and then a high side strike to C with the right back fist, maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
curPatternObj.27: Step 26. Execute a high thrust to D with the left flat finger tip while forming a right L-stance toward D pivoting with the right foot.
curPatternObj.28: Step 27. Execute a low front snap kick to D with the right foot while bring the right palm on the left back hand.
curPatternObj.29: Step 28. Lower the right foot to D to form a left walking stance toward C pivoting with the left foot while thrusting to D with the right back elbow, placing the left side fist on the right fist. Perform in slow motion.
curPatternObj.30: Step 29. Execute a downward strike with the left back hand while forming a right L-stance toward C, pivoting with the right foot. Perform in a stamping motion.
curPatternObj.31: Step 30. Punch the left palm with the right fist while maintaining a right L-stance toward C.
curPatternObj.32: Step 31. Move the right foot to C in a stamping motion to form a left L-stance toward C while executing a downward strike with the right back hand.
curPatternObj.33: Step 32. Punch the right palm with the left fist while maintaining a left L-stance toward C.
curPatternObj.34: Step 33. Execute a middle outward strike to D with the left knife-hand while forming a right L-stance toward D, pivoting with the right foot. Perform in a stamping motion.
curPatternObj.35: Step 34. Execute a high side front strike to D with the right back fist striking the left palm with the right elbow while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot.
curPatternObj.36: Step 35. Move the right foot to D forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle outward strike to D with the right knife-hand. Perform in a stamping motion.
curPatternObj.37: Step 36. Execute a high side front strike to D with the left back fist striking the right palm with the left elbow while forming a right walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot.
curPatternObj.38: Step 37. Execute a low guarding block to C with a reverse knife-hand while forming a right L-stance toward C pivoting with the right foot.
curPatternObj.39: Step 38. Execute a right 9-shape block while forming a left walking stance toward C slipping the left foot.
curPatternObj.40: Step 39. Move the right foot to C forming a left L-stance toward C while executing a low guarding block to C with a reverse knife-hand.
curPatternObj.41: Step 40. Execute a left 9-shape block while forming a right walking stance toward C slipping the right foot.
curPatternObj.42: Step 41. Move the right foot to D forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a horizontal strike with a twin knife-hand.
curPatternObj.43: Step 42. Execute a high strike to C with the right arc-hand while maintaining a left walking stance toward C.
curPatternObj.44: Step 43. Execute a middle front snap kick to C with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 42.
curPatternObj.45: Step 44. Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high strike to C with the left arc-hand.
curPatternObj.46: Step 45. Execute a middle front snap kick to C with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 44.
curPatternObj.47: Step 46. Lower the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the right fist.
curPatternObj.48: Step 47. Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward c. Perform 46 and 47 in a fast motion.
curPatternObj.49: Step 48. Bring the right foot to the left foot to form a close stance toward C while executing a high crescent punch with a twin for-knuckle fist.
curPatternObj.50: Step 49. Move the left foot to B turning counter-clockwise to form a left walking stance toward B while executing a low block to B with the left knife-hand.
curPatternObj.51: Step 50. Execute a high punch to B with the right open fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward B.
curPatternObj.52: Step 51. Move the left foot on line AB forming a right walking stance toward A while executing a low block to A with the right Knife-hand.
curPatternObj.53: Step 52. Execute a high punch to A with the left open fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward A.
curPatternObj.54: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
curPatternObj.title: Choong-JangEdit
